# ExtraDetailingTools This mod aims to add more useful tools for detailing your city and with it more assets normally only available to the editor.
## Features * Transform Tool * More Snapping Option * NetLanes * Surfaces * Decals
### Transform Tool This Tool appear when you click on a compatible object, you are going to see it in the info section of the object at the top right of the screen. Scroll up and down to change the value, you can also scroll up and down to change the incrementation. ### More Snapping Option Do you want to place the object on the building wall, trees perpendicular to the building wall? Now you can. This mod brings the editor snapping options back to the main game. ### NetLanes Netlanes are powerfull assets, they us the same tool as road, you can now place fence, road markings and other stuff. ### Surfaces Do you want to change the texture of the floor? Modify the surface of the building? Now you can. All surfaces are now in the UI and can be used by anyone. ### Decals The surfaces are not enough? Do you want more diversity and details? Decals are made for you, you can place these objects anywhere (if you use Anarchy) to add more diversity to your land.
